content: add a touch of whimsy to your world with this lighthearted crochet pillow that is fun and fast to make featured in soft and fluffy bernat forever fleece your favorite granny squares inspire the colorful wings practice double_crochet single_crochet and granny square-type clusters make a pair in different colors to add a flutter of beauty to your world materials bernat® forever fleece™ 9 9 oz/280 g 194 yds/117 m contrast a bergamot 61009 1 ball contrast b rumpus red 61029 1 ball contrast c white noise 61004 1 ball contrast d rose hip 61003 1 ball measurements approx 24 wide x 20 tall 61 x 51 cm
